name: Flappy Bucket - By Mujnu
description:
FlappyBucket

This game is a survival game, where you have to dodge the rocks falling from the volcano above...

Challenge:

 You cannot move using the arrow keys, but you have to hover on the squares at the bottom to move....

You can click to prevent falling in the boiling lava

Credits:

Thanks to https://www.minecraftskins.com/skin/19901024/bucket-of-water/ for the bucket image in the game

Thanks to https://www.istockphoto.com/illustrations/volcano-cartoon for the wonderful volcanic background image for the game
